name: Deep Dive Design
overview:
Deep Dive Design is a design firm working with Fortune 500 and startup companies to create compelling products. We focus on:

  • Interaction and visual design.
  • Customer research.
  • Design management.

Clients include Chegg, Clover, eBay, Flickr, GetJar, Gigwalk, Groupon, HauteLook, Houzz, Intuit, Joyus, One Kings Lane, Netflix, RedLaser, RelayRides, Slice, TripIt, and Yahoo!.

Our solutions include:

  • Visiontyping: We’re experts at developing innovative concepts for web sites and mobile apps.
  • Design and research: We integrate interaction design, visual design, and customer research to create seamless solutions.
  • Product evaluations: We evaluate existing products to inform the strategic direction and product roadmaps.
  • Design management: We provide expert advice on how to start and build a design group over time, ensuring it contributes to the success of the organization and its customers.

Specialties:

  • User experience design for large-scale consumer web sites and mobile apps.
  • User experience research.
  • Building, leading, and managing design teams.
